entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening then to periods of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending early in the morning then cloudy. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
